plot: A palimino cow pony, through a series of owners and adventures becomes a champion mount for one of the US equestrian team.
title: The Horse with the Flying Tail
plot_es: A palimino cow pony, through a series of owners and adventures becomes a champion mount for one of the US equestrian team.
original_name: The Horse with the Flying Tail
plot_en: A palimino cow pony, through a series of owners and adventures becomes a champion mount for one of the US equestrian team.
